quotes.message: Failure should be our teacher, not our undertaker. Failure is delay, not defeat. It is a temporary detour, not a dead end. Failure is something we can avoid only by saying nothing, doing nothing, and being nothing.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: A fear of weakness only strengthens weakness.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: Fear of failure must never be a reason not to try something.
quotes.name: Frederick Smith

quotes.message: Don't face the fear, and you'll be its slave. Face the fear, and now you are its master. The death of fear is then certain.
quotes.name: Giovanni Dienstmann

quotes.message: There is no impossibility to him who stands prepared to conquer every hazard. The fearful are the failing.
quotes.name: Sarah J. Hale

quotes.message: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: There is no failure except in no longer trying.
quotes.name: Chris Bradford

quotes.message: The men who try to do something and fail are infinitely better than those who try to do nothing and succeed.
quotes.name: Lloyd Jones

quotes.message: Fear of failure is a ticket to mediocrity. If you're not failing from time to time, you're not pushing yourself. And if you're not pushing yourself, you're coasting.
quotes.name: Eric Zorn

quotes.message: When you take risks you learn that there will be times when you succeed and there will be times when you fail, and both are equally important.
quotes.name: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.message: If you're not prepared to be wrong, you'll never come up with anything original.
quotes.name: Ken Robinson

quotes.message: If you don't try at anything, you can't fail, it takes back bone to lead the life you want.
quotes.name: Richard Yates

quotes.message: Don't fear failure. Not failure, but low aim, is the crime. In great attempts it is glorious even to fail.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: Never let the fear of striking out get in your way.
quotes.name: George Herman

quotes.message: To overcome the fear of failure, do what makes you fearful.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: Giving up is the only sure way to fail.
quotes.name: Gena Showalter

quotes.message: You cannot reach the pinnacle of success without overcoming the fear of failure just like you can't reach space without overcoming the attraction of gravity.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: They fail, and they alone, who have not striven.
quotes.name: Thomas Bailey Aldrich

quotes.message: Don't fear failure so much that you refuse to try new things. The saddest summary of a life contains three descriptions: could have, might have, and should have.
quotes.name: Louis E. Boone

quotes.message: We learn wisdom from failure much more than success. We often discover what we will do, by finding out what we will not do.
quotes.name: Samuel Smiles

quotes.message: He who fears being conquered is sure of defeat.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: We shouldn't be fearful of failure because is not a monster as we think it is. It's just a training ground for those who are really striving for excellence in life.
quotes.name: Euginia Herlihy

quotes.message: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
quotes.name: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.message: Those who are acquainted with failure acquire the unique ability to dare without fear of it.
quotes.name: Joyce Rachelle

quotes.message: Failure is instructive. The person who really thinks learns quite as much from his failures as from his successes.
quotes.name: John Dewey

quotes.message: Failure isn't fatal, but failure to change might be.
quotes.name: John Wooden

quotes.message: It's failure that gives you the proper perspective on success.
quotes.name: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.message: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Let the fear of failure be the background noise of your success.
quotes.name: Giovanni Dienstmann

quotes.message: Our greatest fear should not be of failure, but of succeeding at something that doesn't really matter.
quotes.name: D.L. Moody

quotes.message: Success is most often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
quotes.name: Coco Chanel

quotes.message: One who fears failure limits his activities.Failure is only the opportunity to more intelligently begin again.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: Fear of failure is fiction, face this fact and fear will fall.
quotes.name: Amit Kalantri

quotes.message: Failures are finger posts on the road to achievement.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis
